titlepage.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlepage.author: Valerie Love '02
titlepage.sponsor: Encoding funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: The Catherine (Kiki) Hunter Smith Papers relate to her years at Smith College (as an undergraduate student). Types of materials include academic work, appointment books, correspondence, diaries, photographs, resumes, Freshman Carnival information, Sophomore PUSH songs, Junior Ushers paperwork, student government documents such as letters to class representatives and flyers for events, and Morris House memorabilia.

bioghist.p: Kiki Smith was born Catherine Hunter Smith on December 4, 1949 to Dr. and Mrs. Arthur M. Smith. She attended St. Anne's School in Charlottesville, Virginia prior to her enrollment at Smith College. Smith majored in Theater, with minors in English and Art. She was Class President for both her junior and senior years. After receiving an MA in Drama with emphasis in history and directing from the University of Virginia and an MFA with emphasis in costume and lighting design from the University of Texas, she returned to Smith College as an Instructor in Theatre and Speech, 1974 - 1977; Assistant Professor of Theatre and Speech, 1977 - 1986; Associate Professor of Theatre and Speech, 1986 - 1995, and Professor of Theatre and Speech, 1995- present. Smith also served as Dean of Freshmen, 1983 - 1986; and Associate Dean of the Faculty, 1990 - 1992.

scopecontent.p: The Catherine (Kiki) Hunter Smith relate to her years spent at Smith College as an undergraduate student, dating from 1967 to 1971. Types of materials include academic work, appointment books, correspondence, diaries, photographs, resumes, Freshman Carnival information, Sophomore PUSH songs, Junior Ushers paperwork, student government documents such as letters to class representatives and flyers for events, and Morris House memorabilia, including a freshman house handbook.

accessrestrict.p: The papers are open for research according to the regulations of the Smith College Archives without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the documents must be requested from the Smith College Archives. Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Catherine (Kiki) Hunter Smith Papers, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: Kiki Smith donated her letters, diaries, appointment books and other papers from her years at Smith College from 1967-1971 to the College Archives in the Spring of 2000.
